title: SARIMA in Machine Learning
description: In Machine Learning, a seasonal autoregressive integrated moving average (SARIMA) model is a different step from an ARIMA model based on the concept of seasonal trends. In this article, I will introduce you to the SARIMA model in machine learning.
description_lemmatized: machine learning seasonal autoregressive integrated moving average sarima model different step arima model based concept seasonal trend article introduce sarima model machine learning
